languages.text: {n}Руки Кляйна по локоть в крови, а взгляд полон вызова.{/n} "Я осмотрел эту мерзость вдоль и поперек. Внутри царит генетический кошмар — это скверна в облике человека. Лишние органы, чешуя, атрофированные конечности, растущие внутрь. Но это не главное".

{n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."
languages.original_text: {n}Руки Кляйна по локоть в крови, а взгляд полон вызова.{/n} "Я осмотрел эту мерзость вдоль и поперек. Внутри царит генетический кошмар — это скверна в облике человека. Лишние органы, чешуя, атрофированные конечности, растущие внутрь. Но это не главное".

Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."

{n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."

languages.text: {n}Klein patauge dans le sang jusqu'aux coudes, le regard brillant de défi.{/n} « J'ai examiné cette vermine de fond en comble. Ses entrailles sont un vrai cauchemar génétique. Un concentré de corruption emballé dans une peau humaine. Organes supplémentaires, écailles, membres atrophiés incarnés, et j'en passe... mais ce n'est pas le plus important. »
languages.original_text: {n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein patauge dans le sang jusqu'aux coudes, le regard brillant de défi.{/n} « J'ai examiné cette vermine de fond en comble. Ses entrailles sont un vrai cauchemar génétique. Un concentré de corruption emballé dans une peau humaine. Organes supplémentaires, écailles, membres atrophiés incarnés, et j'en passe... mais ce n'est pas le plus important. »

languages.text: {n}Klein está cubierto hasta los codos de sangre. Sus ojos destellan, desafiantes.{/n} «He examinado a esta escoria por fuera y por dentro. Sus entrañas son una pesadilla genética; es corrupción pura envuelta en piel humana. Órganos adicionales, escamas, extremidades internas atrofiadas... Pero eso no es lo importante».
languages.original_text: {n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein está cubierto hasta los codos de sangre. Sus ojos destellan, desafiantes.{/n} «He examinado a esta escoria por fuera y por dentro. Sus entrañas son una pesadilla genética; es corrupción pura envuelta en piel humana. Órganos adicionales, escamas, extremidades internas atrofiadas... Pero eso no es lo importante».

languages.text: {n}克莱因浑身上下都是血迹，眼神充满了挑衅的意味。{/n}“我已经把这堆烂肉里里外外都检查过了。它的内部简直就是基因的大杂烩，就像是一团腐化的烂肉披着人皮一样。到处都是多余的器官、鳞片、萎缩的内生肢体，但这还不是最重要的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因浑身上下都是血迹，眼神充满了挑衅的意味。{/n}“我已经把这堆烂肉里里外外都检查过了。它的内部简直就是基因的大杂烩，就像是一团腐化的烂肉披着人皮一样。到处都是多余的器官、鳞片、萎缩的内生肢体，但这还不是最重要的。”

languages.text: {n}クラインは肘まで血にまみれているが、その目は輝いていた。{/n}「内部も外部も調べた。まるで悪夢のようだ。人間の皮膚に包まれた腐敗の袋だ。余分な臓器、鱗、萎縮した手足。しかし、重要なのはそんなことではないのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインは肘まで血にまみれているが、その目は輝いていた。{/n}「内部も外部も調べた。まるで悪夢のようだ。人間の皮膚に包まれた腐敗の袋だ。余分な臓器、鱗、萎縮した手足。しかし、重要なのはそんなことではないのだ」

languages.text: {n}Klein ist bis zu den Ellbogen mit Blut beschmiert, seine Augen funkeln trotzig.{/n} "Ich habe den Abschaum von innen wie von außen untersucht. Seine Innereien sind ein genetischer Albtraum, ein einziger Sack der Verderbnis, der in menschliche Haut gehüllt wurde. Zusätzliche Organe, Schuppen, verkümmerte eingewachsene Gliedmaßen. Aber das ist nicht das Wichtige."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."

Aber das ist nicht das Wichtige."

languages.text: {n}Dirseklerine kadar kana bulanmış Klein'ın gözleri, küstah bir ışıltı yayıyor.{/n} "Bu pisliğin içini de dışını da inceledim. İç organları, genetik açıdan tam bir kâbus. Âdeta insan derisine sarılmış bir yozlaşma çuvalı. İlave organlar, pullar, içe doğru büyümüş kör uzuvlar... Ancak mühim olan kısmı bu değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein is up to his elbows in blood, his eyes flaring defiantly.{/n} "I've examined the filth inside and out. Its innards are a genetic nightmare — it's a bag of corruption wrapped in human skin. Extra organs, scales, atrophied ingrown limbs. But that's not what's important."
